mapper.sql: id, content, status, topic, user_name, create_time, modify_time
mapper.select: select i.id,i.date date,i.user_account, i.pay, i.expenditure ,c.money,c.invest,c.debt, c.money + c.invest + c.debt total from `info` i left join ( SELECT c.info_id ,sum(if(c.channel1 like '%银行卡%' or c.channel2 like '%余额%' , c.money, 0)) money ,sum(if(c.channel1 like '%理财%' or c.channel2 like '%理财%' or c.channel2 like '%基金%' or c.channel2 like '%帮你%', c.money, 0)) invest ,sum(if(c.channel1 like '信用卡' or c.channel2 like '花呗', c.money,0)) debt from channel c group by DATE_FORMAT(c.insert_time,'%Y-%m-%d'), c.user_account,c.info_id ) c on i.id = c.info_id where i.user_account = #{userAccount,jdbcType=BIGINT} order by i.date desc
